name: HasModel
desc: An interface that provides meshes and materials to define the visual appearance of an entity.

items.name: var model: ModelComponent?
items.desc: The model component for the entity.

items.name: struct ModelComponent
items.desc: A collection of resources that create the visual appearance of an entity.

items.name: var jointNames: [String]
items.desc: The names of all the joints in the entity.

items.name: var jointTransforms: [Transform]
items.desc: The relative joint transforms of the entity.
